entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 16 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Temperature rising to minus 16 by morning. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13. POP 40%

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 15.
